text: This is a list of diplomatic missions in Yemen. Due to the Yemeni Civil War, several countries have closed their embassies in Sana'a. ==Embassies== Sana'a {| | * * *https://www.middleeastmonitor.com/20171019-china-writes-off- over-100-million-of-yemen-debt/ * * * * * * * * * |valign=top| * * * * * * * * * * * * |} == Closed embassies == * - Closed 23 February 2015Egypt shuts embassy in Yemen over ‘bad’ security The Japan Times. 24 February 2015. Accessed 24 February 2015 * - Closed 11 February 2015Britain, France to shutter Yemen embassies Washington Post. 11 February 2015. Accessed 14 February 2015 * - Closed 13 February 2015Germany, Italy close Yemen embassies Business Recorder. 14 February 2015. Accessed 14 February 2015 * - Closed 25 July 2019Situasi Yaman Memburuk, Jokowi Tutup Sementara KBRI di Sana'a CNN Indonesia. 26 July 2019. Accessed 26 July 2019 * - Closed 13 February 2015 * - Closed 16 February 2015Japan Closes Yemen Embassy After Militia Takeover, First Asian Country To Leave Amid Security Concerns International Business Times. 16 February 2015. Accessed 16 February 2015 * - Closed 13 July 2015Open? * - Closed 13 February 2015Clashes between Shi'ite Houthis and Sunnis in Yemen leave 26 dead BBC News. 14 February 2015. Accessed 14 February 2015 * - Closed 14 February 2015 * - Closed 14 February 2015Yemen's Houthis accused of torture against rivals Al Jazeera. 14 February 2015.
